item.title: YUMS - A retrospective
item.description: This is a blog post for the archival of my YUMS project. We had a good run, a month of development that taught me much. But in the end. It all ends the same. Just another bowl of “modular” sphagetti. What was the plan? A simple, barebones implementation that is extendable and scalable. It also should use as few dependancies as possible. There was already an immensely more mature and batteries included framework called Evennia.
